/* Plugin generated by AMXX-Studio */

#include <amxmodx>
#include <amxmisc>
#include <zmvip>
#include <colorchat>

#define PLUGIN "ALL VIP"
#define VERSION "1.0"
#define AUTHOR "Administrator"


public plugin_init() {
	register_plugin(PLUGIN, VERSION, AUTHOR)
	
	register_clcmd("say /allvip", "AllVIP")
	register_concmd("allvip", "AllVIP")
}

public AllVIP(id)
{
	if(!(get_user_flags(id) & ADMIN_CFG))
		return
	for(new pl = 1;pl<=32;pl++)
	{
		if(is_user_connected(pl) && !is_user_bot(id))
		{
			//if(zv_get_user_flags(pl) & ZV_MAIN)
			//	continue;
			zv_set_user_flags(pl,10)
		}
	}
}
